title: Daily Weather in 26 World Cities - 50 Percent
description: This is a variation of the Daily Weather in 26 World Citiesdataset. In this variation, 50% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. This dataset spans 3 years and includes daily weather measurements for 26 cities worldwide. It comprises 17 weather parameters, making it suitable for both multi-variate and single-series forecasting tasks. With data from January 2020 to December 2022, it's an ideal resource for forecasting the 'temperature' series while leveraging other weather measurements as potential exogenous factors.

forecastTarget.name: maxtemp
forecastTarget.description: Target variable; Maximum temperature for the day in Celcius.

pastCovariates.name: mintemp
pastCovariates.description: Minimum temperature for the day in Celcius

pastCovariates.name: avgtemp
pastCovariates.description: Average temperature for the day in Celcius

pastCovariates.name: sunhour
pastCovariates.description: Duration between sunrise and sunset in hours

pastCovariates.name: wind_speed
pastCovariates.description: Maximum wind speed in kilometers per hour

staticCovariates.name: in_northern_hemisphere
staticCovariates.description: Whether the city is in northern hemisphere. This is a static covariate.

staticCovariates.name: in_southern_hemisphere
staticCovariates.description: Whether the city is in southern hemisphere. This is a static covariate.
